--- title: "Week 1" subtitle: "Welcome to MATH/COSC 3570 and Posit Cloud" editor: visual --- ## Prepare 📖 Read the [syllabus](/course-syllabus.html) 📖 Get your laptop and computing environment ready! ## Reading and Resources 📖 [R for Data Science - Introduction](https://r4ds.hadley.nz/intro) 📖 [R for Data Science - Whole game](https://r4ds.hadley.nz/whole-game) 📖 [RStudio IDE :: Cheatsheet](https://rstudio.github.io/cheatsheets/html/rstudio-ide.html?_gl=1*zsoe73*_ga*MTA1OTM3NDA3MC4xNzAyOTMyNDk4*_ga_2C0WZ1JHG0*MTcwMzM1MTM3Ni4yLjEuMTcwMzM1MTQ1Ni4wLjAuMA..) 📖 [Posit Cloud Guide](https://posit.cloud/learn/guide) ## Participate 🖥️ [Slides - Welcome to MATH/COSC 3570](/slides/01-syllabus.html) 🖥️ [Slides - Overview of Data Science](/slides/02-datascience.html "02-datascience") 🖥️ [Slides - Posit Cloud](/slides/03-posit.html "03-posit") ``{=html} `ggplot2::mpg` ``{=html} `ggplot2::diamond` ## Perform 📋 [Lab-00 Posit Cloud](/exercise/lab00-posit.html) 📋 [Lab-01 Running R Script](/exercise/lab01-rscript.html)
